## Microeconomics Form {.tabset .tabset-pills}

### Consumer

Marshallian Demands
\[\max_{\{X, Y\}} U(X,Y)\]
\[s.a: P_xX+P_yY=I  \]

$$Optimum \Rightarrow \frac{Umg_x}{Umg_y}=\frac{P_x}{P_y}$$

$$FUI \Rightarrow U(X^*,Y^*) \Rightarrow v(P_x,P_y,I)$$


$$Roy \Rightarrow \frac{\frac{\partial v(P_x,P_y,I)}{\partial P_x}}{\frac{\partial v(P_x,P_y,I}{\partial I}}=-X^*$$

Hicksian Demands
\[\min_{\{X, Y\}} P_xX+P_yY\]
\[s.a: U(X,Y)=u_0  \]

$$Expense \hspace{2mm} Function \Rightarrow e(P_x,P_y,u_o)=P_xX^{h}+P_yY^{h}$$

$$Shepard \Rightarrow \frac{\partial e(P_x,P_y,u_o)}{\partial P_x}=X^h$$

Slutsky Ecuation
$$\frac{\partial X^*}{\partial P_x}=\underbrace{\frac{\partial X^h}{\partial P_x}}_{ES} -\underbrace{\frac{\partial X^*}{\partial I}X^*}_{EI}$$


### Industrial

$$Lerner \Rightarrow \lambda=\frac{P_i-c_i}{P_i}=\frac{1}{|\varepsilon|}$$

$$Herfindahl-Hirschmann \Rightarrow \sum_{i=1}^{N} S_i^2$$
Collusion
$$\delta \geq \frac{\pi^D-\pi^C}{\pi^D-\pi^{NC}}$$

Bertrand
$$P_i(P_j)=\begin{cases}
    P^M=\frac{A+c}{2} & \text{si } P^M<P_j \\
    P_j-\varepsilon & \text{si } c<P_j\leq P^M \\
    c & \text{si } P_j\leq c
  \end{cases} $$


### Labor

$$Marshall \Rightarrow |\varepsilon_{L,W}|=\frac{\sigma_{L,K}|\eta^d|+\eta_k^s[\alpha_L|\eta^d|+(1-\alpha_L)\sigma_{L,K}]}{\eta_k^s+\alpha_L \sigma_{L,K}+(1-\alpha_L)|\eta^d|}$$
